projects.name: Leads Generation Platform (Euerzuhause)
responsibilities: Utilized Nest JS framework for building the backend infrastructure.
We have developed various APIs, with a focus on the Leads module.
Implemented a matching API equipped with advanced algorithms to correlate user inputs with available options in database collections.
The Reports module generates insightful reports based on user interactions and preferences, such as sales reports, leads reports, and feedback reports.

projects.name: Whrl Loans
responsibilities: Whrrl facilitates working capital funding for Farmers, Traders, and Producer Companies through Warehouse Receipt Lending during extended crop cycles.
Develop APIs for contract deployment and data retrieval.
Integrate web3 functionalities into APIs for blockchain interaction.
Enhance existing smart contracts with new features.

projects.name: NFTree
responsibilities: NFTree mints NFTs representing square footage of land, converted into 3D images through graphic design. Sales proceeds support plantation drives and donations.
Admin (Aurum): Mints NFTree images, lists them for auction, and posts blogs.
User: Bids on listed NFTs; highest bidder gains ownership and access to related blog posts.
Proceeds from auctions go to Aurum's donation account.
Combines NFT technology with philanthropy, funding environmental efforts through NFT sales.

projects.name: EGOLD Platform
responsibilities: We developed a blockchain-based platform to purchase EGOLD tokens, representing ownership of gold, using multiple currencies.
Integrated Stripe and Razorpay payment gateways, ensuring secure transactions.
Implemented Apexchart to display daily EGOLD price, improving user experience and increasing customer retention by 20%.

data.company: Smart Factory Solution India Pvt. Ltd.

projects.name: Mayonnaise Line Monitoring System (Muscat, Oman)
responsibilities: Implemented PLC programming and industrial automation protocols.
Developed a monitoring system to improve production efficiency and reduce downtime.
Created a NodeJs-based backend to collect and analyze production data.

projects.name: Pharmaceutical Blister Machine Monitoring System (Ahmedabad, Gujarat)
responsibilities: Integrated ThingWorx KepWare for real-time data acquisition.
Enhanced system monitoring and maintenance schedules, increasing machine uptime.
Developed a Node.js API for data integration with third-party applications.

projects.name: Edible Oil Line Monitoring System (Muscat, Oman)
responsibilities: Designed and programmed control systems for line monitoring.
Improved process accuracy and operational efficiency.
Utilized Node.js for building a custom dashboard to visualize monitoring data.
